vclaim: A video filmed at the microscopic level shows a nanobot as it “picks up a lazy sperm by the tail and inseminates an egg with it.”
title: Does This Video Show a Nanobot Inseminating Egg with ‘Lazy’ Sperm?
subtitle: The corkscrew shaped "micromotor" is said to help propel immotile sperm.
author: Madison Dapcevich
